item.title: Logging with an HTTP Proxy
item.description: I miss having Chrome dev tools when writing node applications, since I often want to see what exactly the network traffic. Here's a way to easily setup a man in the middle proxy to look at all the traffic your application is generating. Run the docker instance First we first up the proxy with the web interface: docker run --rm -it -p 8080:8080 -p 8081:8081 mitmproxy/mitmproxy mitmweb --web-host 0.
